message: Hello Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly valuable to you, even more so than to others. I'm offering it to you for $950,000. This is a chance to get ahead of the game.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the market value, but this product offers unique advantages that go beyond the standard.  $900,000 is my final offer, and I believe it's a fair reflection of its true worth.
I understand that the product has unique advantages, but I'm still not convinced that it's worth $900,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $825,000. That's the highest I'm willing to go.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. How about we split the difference? $862,500, and you get this incredible asset.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $800,000. I'm willing to meet you at $835,000. That's the lowest I'm willing to go.
